content: Stream created by Alex Kavvos.
Hello. I thought it'd be good if we had a type theory stream. Please populate it with more specific topics!
Christian Williams renamed stream type theory to theory: type theory.
Nathanael Arkor changed the access permissions for this stream from Public to Web-public.

Matteo Capucci (he/him) changed the description for this stream.

  • Old description:

Connections between type theory and category theory, including homotopy type theory

  • New description:

Deprecated, use #theory: mathematics instead. Connections between type theory and category theory, including homotopy type theory
Matteo Capucci (he/him) renamed stream theory: type theory to deprecated: type theory.

  • New description:

Matteo Capucci (he/him) renamed stream deprecated: type theory to theory: types.

Matteo Capucci (he/him) changed the posting permissions for this stream:

  • Old permissions: Only organization administrators and moderators can post.
  • New permissions: All stream members can post.

Matteo Capucci (he/him) changed the description for this stream.
